mapper.select: SELECT CODE, SHORT_URL, MULIT_CLIENTS, DEFAULT_URL, PC_URL, APPLE_URL, CREATE_USER_CODE, CREATE_TIME, INVALID_TIME FROM LINK_URL_CONFIG WHERE CODE = #{code} AND (INVALID_TIME > now() OR INVALID_TIME IS NULL)
SELECT CODE, SHORT_URL, MULIT_CLIENTS, DEFAULT_URL, PC_URL, APPLE_URL, CREATE_USER_CODE, CREATE_TIME, INVALID_TIME FROM LINK_URL_CONFIG WHERE SHORT_URL = #{shortUrl}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LINK_URL_CONFIG ( CODE, SHORT_URL, MULIT_CLIENTS, DEFAULT_URL, CREATE_USER_CODE, CREATE_TIME, INVALID_TIME ) VALUES ( #{code}, #{shortUrl}, #{mulitClients}, #{defaultUrl}, '-1', #{createTime}, #{invalidTime} )
